title: ‘Sometimes You Misjudge’: Tadej Pogačar Catapults off Bike in Dramatic Descending Crash at Strade Bianche
content:
Watch video: World champion left bloodied and banged-up after high-speed descending crash on way to victory at Tuscany's gravel classic.

Read the full article at ‘Sometimes You Misjudge’: Tadej Pogačar Catapults off Bike in Dramatic Descending Crash at Strade Bianche on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
